author: nikmagini
body:
This update fixes https://github.com/dmwm/DDM/issues/64

It is required to remove a call to the old popularity webservice cms-popularity.cern.ch replacing it with a direct query on the DB

Since the retirement of cms-popularity.cern.ch is not urgent this change is not critical

Deployed and tested in private dev instance popularity-web-dev-magini.cern.ch
title: Update popdb web service to 0.3.3
